text: Milton Khondokar is a Bangladeshi film lyricist, music director and film director. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Lyrics for the film Khodar Pore Ma (2012). ==Selected films== ==Notable songs== ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! title: Milton Khondokar
